alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 16 at 11:37AM PDT until June 17 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 11 PM PDT FRIDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH NO LONGER IN EFFECT... * WHAT...For today, south winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. For Friday, south winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. Localized gusts over 60 mph are possible especially near Goldfield. * WHERE...Esmeralda and Central Nye County. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PDT this evening...and 8 AM to 11 PM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Pockets of blowing dust may impact travel on US-95 and US-6.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
